english: Kennicott was closeted in his detective story .
chinese: 肯尼科特埋头看他的侦探小说。

english: I have suddenly taken a fancy to detective stories .
chinese: 我突然喜欢上了侦探小说。

english: I want a detective story please .
"i don't mind detective stories," wilson said uneasily .
chinese: “侦探小说，我也看。”威尔逊局促不安地说。

english: Her book is a hilarious send-up of a conventional spy story .
chinese: 她写的书用的是取笑传统侦探小说的笔法，令人捧腹。
侦探小说造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: To pursue his secret has something of the fascination of a detective story .
chinese: 探索他的秘密颇有些阅读侦探小说的迷人劲儿。

english: A detective novel usually has an intricate plot
chinese: 侦探小说通常有错综复杂的情节

english: I prefer detective stories to children ' s stories
chinese: 比起儿童故事来，我更喜欢侦探小说。

english: I ' ve suddenly taken a fancy to detective stories
chinese: 我突然喜欢上了侦探小说

english: Detective stories have an enduring popularity
chinese: 侦探小说真是经久不衰啊。

english: Detective novels used to hold a special attraction for me
chinese: 过去侦探小说对我特别有吸引力。

english: Is considered the world ' s first real detective story
chinese: 被认为是世界上第一本真正的侦探小说

english: Dom vladimir ' s been reading too many detective stories
chinese: 弗拉基米尔院长一定读了很多侦探小说

english: She devoured the new detective story
chinese: 她如饥似渴地读那本新侦探小说

english: She amused herself by reading detective stories
